P

Pet - Class in application
Instances of this class represent a pet.
Pet(String, Species, ToyType, FoodType) - Constructor for class application.Pet
Initialises all variables used by a pet instance.
PetInteract - Class in application
Displays pet statistics and allows the player to interact with the pet.
PetInteract(Font, Font) - Constructor for class application.PetInteract
Create the panel - initialise all components but do not set values until setPet is called.
PetSetup - Class in application
Allows the user to set the name and species of a single pet, and generate the pet.
PetSetup(Species[], String[], ToyType[], FoodType[], Font, Font, int) - Constructor for class application.PetSetup
Create the panel - a labelled text field for the name and a labelled combo box to choose a species from.
PetStatDisplayer - Class in application
A view only slider that displays information about a pet's attribute.
PetStatDisplayer(Font, Font, String, ImageIcon, String, Color, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class application.PetStatDisplayer
Create the panel - a view only slider that displays information about a pet's attribute to a player.
PetTab - Class in application
A clickable tab which will switch the selected pet to the pet represented in this tab, the tab also displays status effects and action points of the pet.
PetTab(Font) - Constructor for class application.PetTab
Create the pet tab panel - the button, the status overlays, the name/action points labels, and the pet's icon.
play(Toy) - Method in class application.Pet
Makes the pet play with a toy.
Player - Class in application
 
Player(String, Pet[], int) - Constructor for class application.Player
Initialises a new Player instance with the given name and array of pets.
PlayerSetup - Class in application
Allows the user to set up a player, giving it a name and pets.
PlayerSetup(Species[], String[], ToyType[], FoodType[], Font, Font, int) - Constructor for class application.PlayerSetup
Create the panel - a name entry field, a number of pets spinner, and PetSetups.
playWith(Pet, Toy) - Method in class application.Player
The player plays with a pet using a toy.
